articles.description: The news that Amazon has relocated filming to the UK is sure to be welcomed by Tolkien enthusiasts, who have long speculated on the real-life locations in Britain which may have inspired Tolkien's work.
articles.content:
J.R.R. Tolkien's books have garnered blockbuster movies, a global fan following and now a $1billion Amazon series which is set to be produced in the UK, rather than New Zealand.
The news that the co… [+18488 chars]

articles.author: Lucy Buckland
articles.title: Nicki Minaj and husband sued by woman he was jailed for trying to rape - Mirror.co.uk
articles.description: Nicki Minaj and husband Kenneth Petty are being sued by the woman - who is now 43 - after they allegedly offered her half a million dollars to recant the allegations
articles.content:
Nicki Minaj and husband Kenneth Petty are being sued by a woman he tried to rape in 1994 after she claims they offered her half a million dollars to take back her claims.
Petty was jailed for four a… [+2561 chars]

articles.author: Melanie Kaidan
articles.title: William leaves Royal fans overjoyed amid new Diana tribute – 'You'll be a wonderful King' - Express
articles.description: PRINCE William has received praise from royal fans as he honoured Princess Diana's legacy through a new initiative.
articles.content: The Duke of Cambridge launched a new plan as part of the Diana Award to empower young people making change. The Diana Award celebrates young people who aim to improve the lives of others.In honour of… [+727 chars]
